attributes.action: Protect our civil liberties & human rights
attributes.additional_details: We are supposed to be a part of one of the BEST democracies in the world, but a democracy IS definitely NOT creating generational bans, it is giving everyone the RIGHT TO CHOOSE, which a BIN will not allow its citizens to do.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Don’t impose further bans on smoking or vaping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647395
